text: is a Japanese shōjo manga artist. Her first work, Mahōtsukai wa Shitteiru (I Know a Magician) was published in the weekly shōjo anthology Hana to Yume (Flowers and Dreams) in 1982. Her best-known work was Please Save My Earth, a 21-volume series concerning several alien scientists who are reincarnated as high school students in modern Tokyo. The series was adapted into an anime series and published in English. ==Works== * ** (January 20, 1982, published in Hana to Yume, Hakusensha) ** (July 20, 1982, published in Hana to Yume, Hakusensha)
